remarks: Elimination of three existential quantifiers, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-2011.)
statement:
ceqsex3v.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
ceqsex3v.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
ceqsex3v.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
ceqsex3v.4 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsex3v.5 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
ceqsex3v.6 $e |- ( z = C -> ( ch <-> th ) ) $.
ceqsex3v $p |- ( E. x E. y E. z ( ( x = A /\ y = B /\ z = C ) /\ ph ) <-> th ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C x y z $.
$d ch y $.
$d ps x $.
$d th z $.
